name: BlockPoper
description:
Block Poper. A fun puzzle game with blocks and colors and platforms.

Help tiny creature to make it's way through maze made with color blocks by removing  right colors , get the key and reach the door. each level is a unique puzzle.and there will be a lot of levels.

it is in early stages. I made only 4 basic levels. in future there will be ladders(it can't jump!) and teleports and more complex levels and much more. (also some animations and sounds are missing now. )

help to improve it.
